title: Strapless
description: Carly and Ryan are getting married! Carly is convinced she can have it all - a promising law career, the perfect wedding and even a new house... err... mansion. Carly's dream wedding quickly turns into a nightmare, and a mistake from her past threatens her future with Ryan. She wonders if she can juggle everything, or if she'll drop the ball as her best-laid plans fall apart. Can Ryan play the hero in real-life and save the wedding day, or is this the end of Hollywood's newest "it" couple? In this second installment of the Sparks of Hope Series, Carly and Ryan's faith will be put to the test as they learn to trust God's plan for their future together.
author: Becki Brannen
